body_html:
Please see https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/how_tos/using_gpu/index.html.

Specify your gpu with tf.device("/gpu:0"), and let us know if that works.

Additionally, ensure that you are running a gpu-enabled installation of tensorflow. See https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/get_started/os_setup.html.
body_text:
Please see https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/how_tos/using_gpu/index.html.
Specify your gpu with tf.device("/gpu:0"), and let us know if that works.
Additionally, ensure that you are running a gpu-enabled installation of tensorflow. See https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/get_started/os_setup.html.
body:
Please see https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/how_tos/using_gpu/index.html.

Specify your gpu with `tf.device("/gpu:0")`, and let us know if that works.

Additionally, ensure that you are running a gpu-enabled installation of tensorflow. See https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/get_started/os_setup.html.
